org.drip.product.params

Class TerminationSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.params.TerminationSetting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable

    public class TerminationSetting
extends Serializer
implements Validatable
    This class contains the current "liveness" state of the component, and, if inactive, how it entered that state.
